messages.message: Only use the characters 0 to 9 and a plus or minus sign in your answer. Your answer must be a single, whole number.
Only use the characters 0 to 9 and the plus sign in your answer. Your answer must be a single, whole number.
Only use the characters 0 to 9, the decimal point, and the plus and minus signs in your answer. Your answer must be a single integer or decimal.
You don't need to write zeros at the start of the number.
Include a plus sign or a minus sign in your answer.
You don't need to write a plus sign before the number.
Give your answer to at least #p1# significant figures.
Give your answer to no more than #p1# significant figures.
Give your answer to #p1# significant figures.
Include a plus sign in your answer.
You don't need to write a plus sign before the number.
Your answer must be a single, whole number.
Your answer must be a whole number.
Your answer must be a positive number.
Your answer must be a single integer or decimal.
Give your answer to at least #p1# decimal places.
